valueProps.text: Plan, track, and deliver work faster with Asana
Connect strategic goals to teams with AI support

pains: Difficulty in integrating with existing tools

facts.text: Asana helps bring people and AI together to plan, track, and deliver work faster.
facts.evidence: Bring people and AI together to plan, track, and deliver work faster.

facts.text: Asana connects strategic goals to the teams that help achieve them.
facts.evidence: Connect strategic goals to the teams that help achieve them.

facts.text: Asana uses AI to amplify impact by handling work with full business context.
facts.evidence: Let Asana AI handle work for you—with the full context of your business—so your teams can achieve their goals faster.

facts.text: Asana connects with over 300 enterprise tools.
Asana integrates with tools like Microsoft Teams, Google Drive, Salesforce, and Slack.
facts.evidence: Asana connects with the enterprise tools your organization already uses, right out of the box.

facts.text: Asana offers solutions for campaign management, creative production, and more.
facts.evidence: See how Asana keeps work moving across use cases

facts.text: Asana provides clarity and accountability by connecting goals to teams.
Asana standardizes employee onboarding to help new employees make an impact quickly.
facts.evidence: Standardize onboarding to help new employees make an impact quickly.

facts.text: Asana visualizes team staffing and resource availability.
facts.evidence: Visualize how teams are staffed and what resources are available across your business.
